languages.text: "Прошептала?.. Бог-Император требует великих жертв, но тем почетнее служить Ему". {n}Голос Ксиони дрожит, и она поворачивается к мужу, словно ищет силы и поддержки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Неумирающий не мог так поступить!.." {n}Голос Ксиони дрожит, и она еще крепче стискивает руку супруга.{/n}

languages.text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прошептала?.. Бог-Император требует великих жертв, но тем почетнее служить Ему". {n}Голос Ксиони дрожит, и она поворачивается к мужу, словно ищет силы и поддержки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Whispered her name? No! The Undying One could not do something like that!" {n}Xioni's voice is trembling, and she clutches her husband's arm even tighter.{/n}
"Whispered her name? No! The Undying One could not do something like that!" {n}Xioni's voice is trembling, and she clutches her husband's arm even tighter.{/n}
"Whispered her name? No! The Undying One would not do something like that!" {n}Xioni's voice is trembling, and she clutches her husband's arm even tighter.{/n}
"Whispered her name? No! The Undying One would not do something like that!" {n}Xioni's voice is trembling, and she clutches her husband's arm even tighter.{/n}
"Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}
"Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}

languages.text: « La mort... C'est un immense sacrifice qu'exige l'Empereur-Dieu, mais il n'en est que plus honorable. » {n}Xioni a la voix qui tremble, et en quête de force et de soutien, elle se tourne vers son mari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La mort... C'est un immense sacrifice qu'exige l'Empereur-Dieu, mais il n'en est que plus honorable. » {n}Xioni a la voix qui tremble, et en quête de force et de soutien, elle se tourne vers son mari.{/n}

languages.text: «Susurros... El Dios Emperador exige un gran sacrificio, pero eso solo hace que estar a Su servicio sea un mayor honor». {n}La voz de Xioni se entrecorta y se gira para mirar a su marido, en busca de fuerza y apoyo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Susurros... El Dios Emperador exige un gran sacrificio, pero eso solo hace que estar a Su servicio sea un mayor honor». {n}La voz de Xioni se entrecorta y se gira para mirar a su marido, en busca de fuerza y apoyo.{/n}

languages.text: 「囁きが聞こえました…神帝陛下は大きな犠牲を要求されましたが、皇帝に仕えることは何より名誉なことなのです」{n}シオニは声を震わせて、彼女は夫の力と支えを求めて振り向いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「囁きが聞こえました…神帝陛下は大きな犠牲を要求されましたが、皇帝に仕えることは何より名誉なことなのです」{n}シオニは声を震わせて、彼女は夫の力と支えを求めて振り向いた。{/n}

languages.text: “低声呼唤她……神皇要求我们付出巨大的牺牲，但这样的牺牲，会让我们的职责更加光荣。”{n}肖妮的声音颤抖着，看着她的丈夫，寻求力量和支持。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “低声呼唤她……神皇要求我们付出巨大的牺牲，但这样的牺牲，会让我们的职责更加光荣。”{n}肖妮的声音颤抖着，看着她的丈夫，寻求力量和支持。{/n}

languages.text: "Geflüstert ... Der Gottimperator fordert ein großes Opfer, doch das macht es nur umso ehrenhafter, Ihm zu dienen." {n}Xionis Stimme zittert, und sie wendet sich hilfesuchend ihrem Ehemann zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Geflüstert ... Der Gottimperator fordert ein großes Opfer, doch das macht es nur umso ehrenhafter, Ihm zu dienen." {n}Xionis Stimme zittert, und sie wendet sich hilfesuchend ihrem Ehemann zu.{/n}

languages.text: "Fısıldadı... Tanrı İmparator büyük bir fedakârlık talep etse de bu, O'na hizmeti sadece daha da onurlu kılıyor." {n}Xioni'nin sesi titriyor. Kuvvet ve destek almak için kocasına dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whispered... The God-Emperor demands a great sacrifice, yet it makes serving Him all the more honourable." {n}Xioni's voice trembles, and she turns to her husband for strength and support.{/n}
